nodes.text: The Vanicus were an influential political dynasty that existed during the time of the Galactic Republic. In 104 ABY, Doctor Gabrel Treon mentioned the Vanicus in Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Praji: A Cartel of Genes, a history of the Praji family that was published in the Byblos Journal of Historical Science.
Nathan O'Keefe, the author of Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Praji, intended the Vanicus to be a reference to Orley Vanicus, a character who appeared the the comic series Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi.
